What's happening?

Summary: M2 buses are detoured in both directions due to road work on Adam Clayton Powell Jr Blvd between W 135th St  W 145th St
Description:
M2 buses are detoured in both directions due to road work on Adam Clayton Powell Jr Blvd between W 135th St  W 145th St
Northbound M2 buses will not make stops on Adam Clayton Powell Jr Blvd from W 133rd St to W 145th St.
Southbound M2 buses will not make stops on Adam Clayton Powell Jr Blvd from W 148 St to W 135th St.

While detoured, M2 Buses will stop at M7 stops along Lenox Ave between W 145th St and W 135th St.

Note: Bus arrival information may not be available/accurate while buses are detoured.

Use this map to view how buses are detoured.

Summary: Southbound M1 and M2 buses bypass the stop on 5th Ave at 109th St
Description:
Southbound M1 and M2 buses bypass the stop on 5th Ave at 109th St
What's Happening?
Central Park Perimeter Construction

Note: Bus arrival information may not be accurate or available in the service change area.

Summary: S40 and S90 buses will not make the Chelsea Ave/Bloomfield Ave stops in either direction due to flooding at that location.
Description:
S40 and S90 buses will not make the Chelsea Ave/Bloomfield Ave stops in either direction due to flooding at that location.
Use the 5th St/Amazon Fulfillment Center stop instead.
Click this link to see how buses will run along the detoured route.

Note: Bus arrival information may not be available while buses are detoured.

Summary: 74 St-Broadway/Jackson Hts-Roosevelt Av [E][F][M][R][7] Station elevators from the street level to mezzanine and to/from the [7] platform are closed
Description:
74 St-Broadway/Jackson Hts-Roosevelt Av [E][F][M][R][7] Station elevators from the street level to mezzanine and to/from the [7] platform are closed
[accessibility icon] The nearest accessible subway station connecting with the Q70-SBS is 61 St-Woodside [accessibility icon] [7]. 

For additional travel alternatives, plan your trip at mta.info, use the MTA app (download the app for iOS or Android), or check our Elevator & Escalator Status page.

What's happening?
We're replacing the elevators

Summary: B35 stops on 39th St at 1st Ave in both directions and eastbound stops on 39th St at 2nd Ave and 3rd Ave are closed
Description:
B35 stops on 39th St at 1st Ave in both directions and eastbound stops on 39th St at 2nd Ave and 3rd Ave are closed
Buses start and end their trips at a temporary location on 2nd Ave at 37th St and make an eastbound stop on 37th St and 4th Ave at the existing B70 bus stop.
(See map)

What's happening?
NYC DEP Sewer Replacement

Note: Real-time tracking on BusTime may be inaccurate in the service change area.

Summary: M2 stops on W 165th St at Amsterdam Ave and all stops along Edgecombe Ave are closed in both directions
Description:

For northbound service, use the stops on Adam Clayton Powell Jr Blvd at W 153rd St or W 168th St at Audubon Ave.

For southbound service, use the stops on W 166th St at St Nicholas Ave or W 155th St at Edgecombe Ave.

Buses also make requested stops along Amsterdam Ave at M101 stops between W 155th St and W 165th St in both directions.

See a map of the detour.

What's happening?
Paving

Note: Real-time tracking on BusTime may be inaccurate in the service change area

Summary: Have you noticed that we're updating bus stop signs in Queens? We're preparing for the Queens Bus Network Redesign coming this summer
Description:
Have you noticed that we're updating bus stop signs in Queens? We're preparing for the Queens Bus Network Redesign coming this summer
Queens Bus Network Redesign service improvements will be phased in by route on June 29 and August 31, 2025.

Until then, know that your bus route will still serve current stops, but some signs will reflect future service.

Use the MTA app or BusTime to plan your trip.

Learn more about the project at mta.info/queensbus
